name: A Charitable Donation
description:
A CHARITABLE DONATION

Give back to your local community in the most aggressive way possible: throwing money in their faces until they disappear.

Made for the TriJam 202 in 3 hours by Noah Schultz.

The theme of the jam was "Free for All". This game adheres to the theme by making the money you shoot "Free" for "All" of your victims...I mean beneficiaries. 

There is an audio slider at the beginning but I didn't have enough time for sounds oops.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Shoot / Move
P - Back to Menu
